DOC.brief_summary: Total Knee Arthroplasty (TKA) is a common orthopedic surgery usually leads to Bleeding. The null hypothesis of this study was that TA has no effect on post surgical bleeding in patients undergoes TKA.
DOC.brief_title: Low Dose Peri- Operative Intra Venous Teranexamic Acid Reduces Blood Loss After Total Knee Arthroplasty: A Double Blind Randomized Placebo Controlled Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: Individuals with osteoarthritis who indicated for primary TKA. Previous history of ceberovascular diseases Previous history of myocardial infarction Candidates for bilateral TKA
